name: Idle Racetrack 3D
description:
Start small and work your way up to be the owner of the biggest Race Track ever seen!

-Unlock different ticket categories and shops to earn more money
- Upgrade your stands to hold more audience
- Upgrade your ticket booths, your kiosks and your stands to earn as much money as possible!
- If this is going too slow, tap on the carpets to serve your customers faster and earn even more!
